about_the_game:
In the tunnels below the school Fauna Akademia lies relics of our past, daemon and daemon hunters, and a whole ton of your books that got stolen by a very very powerful daemon May, we're going to have to work together if we want to find them all before the next inventory or audit or whatever.

Don't act shocked May but as Head Librarian you're responsible for
  • Exploring the campus grounds of Fauna Akademia to see if any students have any clue about where those books went
  • Going down into the tunnels and seeing if you can find that daemon from earlier
  • Fighting daemon that get in your way, with your card magic that you do
  • Making friends with the people in the lab, they'll help you out in the tunnels and to be honest they need friends
  • Whatever librarians do

Sorry to write this really quickly May, but I am trying to diffuse several bombs at the same time and I'm not even sure people read this far in the game description. We'll talk soon.

- Jaro

name: Wyrmhole: The Forbidden Knowledge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 / Intel i3-4130
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750ti or newer
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: A daemon spawned by a lab accident steals the Sacred Texts of Fauna Akademia and vanishes into the tunnels beneath. As the Head Librarian May, and with a team of laboratory researchers, conquer the tunnels and demand on time book returns.
